oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Topology abstraction algorithms for light-mesh - an alternate model for PON
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: AGRAWAL, A
GUMASTE, A
CHAMANIA, M
GHANI, N
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Light-mesh - an alternate solution for access networks is presented. Two heuristic topology algorithms are discussed and simulated showing cost and performance benefits. (C) 2008 Optical Society of America.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: 2008 CONFERENCE ON OPTICAL FIBER COMMUNICATION/NATIONAL FIBER OPTIC ENGINEERS CONFERENCE, VOLS 1-8,2388-2390
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Conference on Optical Fiber Communications/National Fiber Optic Engineers Conference,San Diego, CA,FEB 24-28, 2008
